GALLERY.TITLE_LABEL: Add stunning images and make your visuals stand out by adding a blur or zoom-in effect
GALLERY.TEXT_1_LABEL: Surprise your readers by blurring an image. Clicking to reveal the image gives them an interactive and engaging content experience!
GALLERY.TEXT_2_LABEL: Draw your readers' attention to the focal point of an image using the Zoom filter.
GALLERY.TEXT_3_LABEL: Use the blur effect to give readers the choice to decide if they want to see graphic content or not.
